building_details.building_ref: Rear side extension (to match existing height)

description: Proposal for a rear/side infill extension,  replacement window on rear elevation (first floor of outrigger), new sash window in side wall/first floor of outrigger and associated works. Changes to the front yard with low level fencing/gate, bike store, and new entrance door to basement flat.
decision_conditions:
The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-5ca44878-7fff-5ba1-3265-a5ad3677837e"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification and a drainage layout of at least one suitable sustainable drainage systems (i.e. water butt with overflow, raingarden, bioretention planter box, living roof (substrate depth of 80-150mm excluding the vegetative mat), permeable paving, etc.) shall be submitted to, and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">.</span></span></p><p><span style="background-color: transparent; font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: In the interests of prevention of exacerbation of surface water flood risk to adjoining land.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2ffbcf0f-7fff-048f-c152-01f42a449c61"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">No development shall commence, other than works of demolition, until a report (including intrusive investigation/trial pit and monitoring where necessary) demonstrating that the lower ground floor development will not increase the potential for groundwater flooding to itself or to the surrounding area has been submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval. Details of appropriate controls including flood resilience and/or resistance measures against surface water and groundwater (if identified) shall be submitted to the LPA for approval and the approved measures incorporated before the basement is occupied. The lower ground floor shall be constructed and completed in accordance with the approved plans in line with BS 8102:2009 code of practice for "protection of below ground structures against water from the ground" and current best practice.&nbsp;</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-2ffbcf0f-7fff-048f-c152-01f42a449c61"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;"><span id="docs-internal-guid-b6c043c0-7fff-7cab-11b7-268169798527"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: In the interests of prevention of harm to human health and property as a result of flood.</span></span><br></span></span><br></p>

<p><google-sheets-html-origin></google-sheets-html-origin></p><span id="docs-internal-guid-4101fb2d-7fff-fd1f-4f11-b47a2b5bc7ed"><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">Details, including sections at a scale of 1:20, of the planting within the planter box above the bike store in the front garden and an associated maintenance plan shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing, before the construction of the bike store commences. The bike store shall be implemented in accordance with the approved details and shall thereafter be retained and maintained.<br></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the external appearance of the development is satisfactory, with suitable vegetation within the planter box to retain an element of visible landscaping within the front garden that preserves the character and appearance of the streetscene.</span></p><div><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><br></span></div></span>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">The materials used in any exterior work shall be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse except where different materials are specified on the approved drawings.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-6745c6ac-7fff-1e9f-df45-130391ee5da2"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.295;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:8pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: To ensure that the proposal does not detract from the character and appearance of the surrounding area. </span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">Prior to the construction of the ground floor extension, details of the obscure glazing for the rooflight shall be submitted to, and approved in writing by, the local planning authority.<br></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-692e8fe2-7fff-fed1-1c63-234a2b4e3229"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1.2; margin-top: 6pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><span style="font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline;">Reason: To safeguard the residential amenity of occupants of the upper level of the building. </span></p>
